title: Artist/Designer
description: Creates visual art, designs products, or produces media content.

title: Engineer
description: Designs and builds systems, structures, or machines.

title: Teacher
description: Educates and mentors students of all ages.

title: Athlete/Sports Coach
description: Competes in sports or trains others in athletic skills.

title: Scientist
description: Conducts research and experiments to advance knowledge.

title: Doctor/Nurse
description: Provides medical care and promotes health.

title: Entrepreneur
description: Starts and manages new business ventures.

title: Writer
description: Creates written content across various genres.

title: Social Worker
description: Helps individuals and communities overcome challenges.
